type.description: Human-readable label that identifies this token filter type.

min.markdownDescription: Number that specifies the minimum length of a token. Value must be less than or equal to `max`.
min.description: Number that specifies the minimum length of a token.

max.markdownDescription: Number that specifies the maximum length of a token. Value must be greater than or equal to `min`.
max.description: Number that specifies the maximum length of a token.
